metadata.name: Drokpa Diva
metadata.description:
Behold "Drokpa Diva, snapshot of youthful charm and timeless tradition. 

This damsel is flaunting her traditional attire and larger than life headgear, her vivacity rivaling the vibrant hues of her dress.

It is not easy to dress up with the heavy silver jewelleries and the other accessories which carry equal amounts of weight and sit for hours long for a shoot but she was ever so delightful. 

Her gaze carried the depth of a river and each flower narrated a unique story.

This image was also showcased in the Dany2023 Beijing Exhibition â€œColors of Joy ''.
